Leveling Guide

Key Zones & Levels

A1: Coast (2), Mud (4), Ledge (5)
A2: Forest (8), Wetlands (12), Vaal (15)
A3: City (20), Docks (22), Library (24)
A4: Mines (26), Belly (29), Dried (31)

Resistance Penalties

Act 5: -30% all res
Act 10: -60% all res
Priority: Fire > Cold > Lightning

Must-Have Items

‚Ä¢ Movement speed boots (10%+)
‚Ä¢ Quicksilver flask (ASAP)
‚Ä¢ Life flasks with bleed immunity
‚Ä¢ Resist gear for act 5 & 10

Efficiency Tips

‚Ä¢ Stay within 3 levels of zone
‚Ä¢ Don't over-farm early zones
‚Ä¢ Complete skill point quests
‚Ä¢ Use movement skills constantly
